scripts.text:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [Audit].[mig_objects_list];
CREATE TABLE [Audit].[mig_objects_list] (
    id int identity(1,1),
    objectname varchar(1000),
    label varchar(1000),
    systemname varchar(1000),
    category varchar(1000),
    sql text,
    enabled int,
    order_position int,
    extract int,
    load int,
    insert_datetime datetime default GETDATE()
);

insert into [Audit].[mig_objects_list] (objectname , systemname , category, sql, enabled, order_position,extract, load) values ('Account','Salesforce','Salesforce Standard',
'
SELECT 
      [Name]
      ,[Type]
         ,CASE
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = ''012w0000000QYhHAAW'' THEN ''0127R000000c0E0''
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = ''012w0000000QYhGAAW'' THEN ''0127R000000c0LB''
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = ''012w0000000QYhIAAW'' THEN ''0127R000000c0LC''
			WHEN [RecordTypeId] = ''01220000000AFrcAAG'' THEN ''0127R000000c0E5''
		END as RecordTypeId
      ,[BillingStreet]
      ,[BillingCity]
      ,[BillingState]
      ,[BillingPostalCode]
      ,[BillingCountry]
      ,[BillingLatitude]
      ,[BillingLongitude]
      ,[BillingGeocodeAccuracy]
      ,[ShippingStreet]
      ,[ShippingCity]
      ,[ShippingState]
      ,[ShippingPostalCode]
      ,[ShippingCountry]
      ,[ShippingLatitude]
      ,[ShippingLongitude]
      ,[ShippingGeocodeAccuracy]
      ,[Phone]
      ,[Fax]
      ,[AccountNumber]
      ,[Website]
      /*,[PhotoUrl]*/
      ,[Sic]
      ,[Industry]
      ,[AnnualRevenue]
      ,[NumberOfEmployees]
      ,[Ownership]
      ,[TickerSymbol]
      ,[Description]
      ,[Rating]
      ,[Site]
      /*,[LastViewedDate]

      ,[PersonMailingState]
      ,[PersonMailingPostalCode]

      ,[PersonMailingLongitude]

      ,[PersonOtherCity]

      ,[PersonOtherPostalCode]
      ,[PersonOtherCountry]
      ,[PersonOtherLatitude]
      ,[PersonOtherLongitude]
      ,[PersonOtherGeocodeAccuracy]

      ,[PersonDoNotCall]
      /*,[PersonLastCURequestDate]
      ,[PersonLastCUUpdateDate]*/

      ,[PersonEmailBouncedDate]
      ,[Jigsaw]
      /*,[JigsawCompanyId]*/

  FROM [SF_Archive].[account]
  WHERE IsPersonAccount = ''False'' and id in (select AccountId from audit.mig_account_list)
',
  1,1,1,1);

insert into [Audit].[mig_objects_list] (objectname , systemname , category, sql, enabled, order_position,extract, load) values ('Contact','Salesforce','Salesforce Standard',null,1,3,1,1);
insert into [Audit].[mig_objects_list] (objectname , systemname , category, sql, enabled, order_position,extract, load) values ('Lead','Salesforce','Salesforce Standard',
'
select
l.LastName,
l.FirstName,
l.Salutation,
l.Title,
l.Company,
l.Street,
l.City,
l.State,
l.PostalCode,
l.Country,
l.Latitude,
l.Longitude,
l.GeocodeAccuracy,
l.Phone,
l.MobilePhone,
l.Fax,
l.Email,
l.Website,
l.Description,
l.LeadSource,
l.Status,
l.Industry,
l.Rating,
l.AnnualRevenue,
l.NumberOfEmployees,
l.HasOptedOutOfEmail,
l.IsConverted,
l.ConvertedDate, 
case 
	when l.IsConverted =1 
	then (select m.Id from audit.mig_mapIDs m where m.LegacyId__c = l.ConvertedAccountId and m.objectname=''Account'') 
end ConvertedAccountId,
case 
	when l.IsConverted =1 
	then (select m.PersonContactId from audit.mig_mapIDs m where m.LegacyId__c = l.ConvertedAccountId and m.objectname=''Account'') 
end ConvertedContactId,
l.IsUnreadByOwner,
DATETRUNC(day, CONVERT(DATETIME, l.CreatedDate)) as CreatedDate,
l.LastModifiedDate,
l.DoNotCall,
l.HasOptedOutOfFax,
l.smagicinteract__SMSOptOut__c,
l.Unica_AddressLine1__c,
l.Unica_AddressLine2__c,
l.Unica_Base_ID__c,
l.Unica_City__c,
l.Unica_MDB_ID__c,
l.Unica_ZipCode__c
from SF_archive.Lead l
where l.IsDeleted = 0 
and (
	exists (select 1 from [Audit].[mig_account_list] a where l.ConvertedAccountId = a.AccountId)
	or 
	l.ConvertedAccountId is null
)
',1,4,1,1);

---

activities.name: SF - Create mig_account_list
activities.description: Table holding list of accounts for migration. To be populated manually.

scripts.text:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE name='mig_account_list' and xtype='U')
    CREATE TABLE [Audit].[mig_account_list] (
        AccountId varchar(1000),
        insert_datetime datetime default GETDATE()
    )
